items.title: 12,000-year-old rock art found in Arabia reveals a lost civilization
bullets: • Archaeologists in Saudi Arabia discovered over 170 ancient rock engravings that may be among the earliest monumental artworks in the region
• Created between 12,800 and 11,400 years ago, the figures were carved when water and life returned to the desert
• Artifacts found nearby show early Arabian peoples connected to distant Neolithic communities
